title: Apple Music Operations Program Manager
summary: The people here at Apple don’t just create products — they create the kind of wonder that’s revolutionized entire industries! It’s the diversity of those people and their ideas that inspires the innovation that runs through everything we do, from amazing technology to industry-leading environmental efforts. Join Apple, and help us leave the world better than we found it! Apple Music Operations is at the center of the Apple Music ecosystem. Our operations expertise drives the development of technical tools, content quality, processes and resources; all while delivering first-class experience to music lovers around the world. In this role, you will be able to help shape the future of lyrics on Apple Music. You will drive projects that keep raising the bar for lyrics in the industry. This role combines a passion for music with a strong analytical, data-driven and organized mind to track multiple projects at once. You will be the liaison between the Lyrics Operations team and our partners, inside and outside Apple. You will be working internationally on strategies to better support the customer experience with Apple Music Lyrics.
description:
Support Editorial priorities and cross-functional campaigns on Apple Music
Lead Editorial efforts globally in partnership with international local teams
Lead the strategy for lyrics coverage in the US and globally 
Track projects from inception to completion across multiple teams
Streamline processes and reporting
Manage relationship with external lyrics partners
This role might require you to be available after hours or on weekends, based on off-schedule releases
key_qualifications:
Substantial experience with project/program management in related industry
Substantial experience working with external partners
Excellent written and verbal communication -- able to tailor communications to all levels of the organization and outside Apple
Outstanding collaboration skills, excelling at both high-level thinking and execution as well as in the ability to influence and inspire others to achieve a common goal
Proven ability to set up, organize, complete and report on complex projects across multiple teams
preferred_qualifications:
Native-level proficiency in another language besides English and inclusive knowledge of other cultural norms
Deep familiarity with the Apple ecosystem of services and hardware
Strong presentation skills in front of large audiences and leadership
Bachelor’s degree
pay_benefits:
At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role. The base pay range for this role is between $119,200 and $225,500, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location.

Apple employees also have the opportunity to become an Apple shareholder through participation in Apple’s discretionary employee stock programs. Apple employees are eligible for discretionary restricted stock unit awards, and can purchase Apple stock at a discount if voluntarily participating in Apple’s Employee Stock Purchase Plan. You’ll also receive benefits including: Comprehensive medical and dental coverage, retirement benefits, a range of discounted products and free services, and for formal education related to advancing your career at Apple, reimbursement for certain educational expenses — including tuition. Additionally, this role might be eligible for discretionary bonuses or commission payments as well as relocation. Learn more about Apple Benefits.

Note: Apple benefit, compensation and employee stock programs are subject to eligibility requirements and other terms of the applicable plan or program.
